title: Ekko mechanic I thought of.
body:
(Not sure if this is basic mechanic or not, I've never seen it, sooooo :/) Well, i was playing {{champion:245}} , and it occurred to me that the q follows wherever you would go..... sooooooo, Could you e into the team, chuck your q out, flash out of the team (from where you e'd from), wait for your Chronobreak's shadow is in there team, Use your R while the q is coming back and then the q would hit the team 3 times as it would turn back around to follow you.. this is just something i thou of, it could be really bad, as your stuck in the enemy team, but also may be really good if your AP {{champion:245}}  with Zhonyas.
The main point of it is to make the q turn around 3 times in the middle of a team fight.

replies.body: yes it can hit up to 5 times, throw it out near enemy base (with a ward) b with baron b, tp back, b, use ult, b, if you hit them with every proc of it it does insane damage as full ap, and because its all return, it has the bonus damage. Maybe more if you use tahm

I guess so, but mid team fight in a game where you are pushing down mid, i dont think that is very easy to do, but sure. ill give it a shot.
Thanks for replying

Pickle ;)
